alt: Suspected cartel gunmen cross illegally into United States
description: The image depicts a man in a wooded area, holding a firearm. He is wearing a cap and a short-sleeved shirt. The man appears to be in motion, possibly walking or running, as suggested by the blurred background. The background is a mix of trees and what seems to be a fence or barrier, indicating that the man is in a natural, outdoor setting. The image has a grainy texture, which could suggest it is an older photograph or has been altered to have a vintage or aged appearance. The man's expression is not clearly visible, but his posture and the way he holds the firearm suggest a sense of urgency or readiness.
article_heading: Texas Gov Abbott defies Biden administration amid border battle over island used by cartels

description: The image is a split-screen of two photos featuring a young girl. On the left side, the girl is seated at a dining table with a birthday cake in front of her. The cake is decorated with lit candles, and the girl is wearing a striped shirt. She is smiling and looking directly at the camera. On the right side, the girl is standing and holding a violin. She is wearing a dark blue shirt and has long, curly hair. She is also smiling and looking at the camera. The background of the right photo is dark, with a hint of a stage or performance area.
article_heading: Biden-Harris border crisis: Mother of Jocelyn Nungaray gives emotional testimony during migrant crime hearing
